duties_responsibilities.duty: Provide technical support and assistance to customers via phone, email, or chat, addressing and resolving their issues in a timely and professional manner.
Troubleshoot and diagnose hardware, software, and network-related problems, providing effective solutions and guidance to customers.
Utilize remote desktop tools, VPN client software, and web-based applications to assist customers with troubleshooting and issue resolution.
Document support interactions, solutions, and troubleshooting steps in the company's customer support system for future reference and improvement.
Collaborate with the technical support team to share knowledge, best practices, and contribute to a positive and productive team culture.
Adhere to established customer service standards, ensuring a high level of customer satisfaction and retention.

education_certification.credential: BA or Vocational school degree preferred or equivalent work experience
Microsoft Certified Professional certification a plus
